mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contents c WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM contents c WHERE c.contents_type = #{type}
SELECT c.* FROM contents c INNER JOIN courses cc ON cc.contents_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.contents_type = #{type}
SELECT c.* FROM contents c WHERE c.top_id = #{id} OR c.id = #{id} AND c.contents_type = #{type}
SELECT c.* FROM contents c WHERE c.parent_id = #{id}

mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, parent_d = #{parentId}, path = #{path}
